Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Because of you, I laugh a little harder, cry a little less, and smile a lot more. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: For the two of us, home isn’t a place. It is a person. And we are finally home. Stephanie Perkins

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You know you are in love when you don’t want to fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams. Dr. Seuss

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Forever is a long time, but I wouldn’t mind spending it by your side. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they’re right if you love to be with them all the time. Julia Child

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I just want you to know, that when I picture myself happy, it’s with you. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you. Virginia Woolf

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person. Mignon McLaughlin

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply. Zane Grey

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In a sea of people, my eyes will always search for you. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our anniversary is just a momentary celebration, but our marriage is a timeless one. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’m in love with you, and I’m not in the business of denying myself the simple pleasure of saying true things. John Green

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’m much more me when I’m with you. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more. Angelita Lim

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life. Rita Rudner

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Marriage is not just spiritual communion, it is also remembering to take out the trash. Joyce Brothers

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’ll love you even when you’re old and wrinkly. Anonymous

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays. Henny Youngman

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A wedding band is the smallest handcuff ever made, I’m glad I chose my cellmate wisely. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A marriage anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A good marriage is like a casserole—only those responsible for it really knows what goes in it. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end. Catherine Zeta-Jones

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Real love stories never have endings. Richard Bach

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other. Audrey Hepburn

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We loved with a love that was more than love. Edgar Allan Poe

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If I know what love is, it is because of you. Herman Hesse

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Life is a journey, and love is what makes that journey worthwhile. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Loved you yesterday, love you still, always have, always will. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In you, I’ve found the love of my life and my closest, truest friend. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I love you – I am at rest with you – I have come home. Dorothy L. Sayers

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are my today and all of my tomorrows. Lee Christopher

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same. Emily Brontë

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you. A. A. Milne

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage. Martin Luther

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine. Maya Angelou

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years. Simone Signoret

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known and even that is an understatement. F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul. Judy Garland

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I wish there was a word more than ‘love’ itself to convey what I feel for you. Faraaz Kazi

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The minute I heard my first love story I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don’t finally meet somewhere. They’re in each other all along. Jalal ad-Din Rumi

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Forever is a measure of time used by people who share an ordinary love. Our extraordinary love is immeasurable … for us, forever just won’t do. Steve Maraboli

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The couples that are ‘meant to be’ are the ones who go through everything that is meant to tear them apart and come out even stronger than they were before. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. That’s what I hope to give you forever. Nicholas Sparks

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there’s a life after that, I’ll love you then. Cassandra Clare

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Grow old with me, the best is yet to be. Robert Browning

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change … I will always keep falling in love with you. Karen Clodfelder

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out. Roy Croft

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I never loved you any more than I do, right this second. And I’ll never love you any less than I do, right this second. Kami Garcia

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Immature love says: ‘I love you because I need you.’ Mature love says ‘I need you because I love you.’ Erich Fromm

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Success in marriage does not come merely through finding the right mate, but through being the right mate. Barnette R. Brickner

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Better than I was, more than I am. And all this happened by taking your hand. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, but falling in love with you I had no control over. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I swear when our lips touch, I can taste the next sixty years of my life. Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary! It’s such a blessing to have you in my life!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s easy to fall in love, but staying in love with the same person for the rest of one’s life is considerably more difficult. May God provide us the strength to stay committed to one another. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The sound of the sea and the echo of your love share a few characteristics in common: they are both constant and eternal. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If I could go back in time and choose again, I would choose you. My dear, I wish you a happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary! May God continue to bless you and keep you happy.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The sweetest of anniversaries are the result of enduring life’s most difficult situations. Happy Anniversary, love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Everything was like a dark sky until you, my brightest star, came through. We’ve had our ups and downs, but my heart always knew we’d make it this far. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Even after all these years of depending on you, you haven’t grown tired of me and thrown me out. Here’s hoping you stay this way for the rest of your life. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I think it’s very beautiful how two complete strangers can be brought together by the essence of love, and I hope this love lasts for many years to come.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our anniversary will remind you of the happiest times of our relationship, but it will also remind us of the hardships you had to through to get to those happy times. I wish you the best!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May the love we share become stronger as we grow older together. I wish you a lifetime of happiness. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May the sun always shine on the path we share, the moon always shine brightly in our hearts, and the shooting stars always keep a close watch on us everywhere we go. Happy Anniversary, love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I get a lot of emotions, happiness, joy, and excitement from loving you. I’m happy to treasure those feelings for you. Wishing to share those for another year or so.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I hope this adventure could go on forever because of the way you love me and the way you touch my life. Thank you for making this a memorable day in my life. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: To be successful, most couples spend all of their time working. However, we strike the perfect balance, pursuing achievement via work, love, and happiness. I wish you a happy anniversary, love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I wish you and I a happy, healthy, and lovely life together in the future, just as we did years ago.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary, dear! May our beautiful bond last forever!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May the light of happiness constantly shine through the clouds of misunderstandings in our eternal relationship, forming a rainbow of love. Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It takes time to build the kind of relationship that’s almost entirely perfect. We have seemed to have done it all in one year. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I wish you a happy anniversary, my love. Remember the good times and leave the bad behind; reminisce about joyful memories while ignoring the sad. Take pleasure in a love that has endured so long that even angels are singing a song of joy.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The road to love is long and winding, but we’ve always stood by one other in the face of difficulties. I hope that on our anniversary, this journey will continue to bring us joy for many more years!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We have endured the actual test of time, growing with one other and closer together every year, through good times and bad. With that, I wish you the best in life.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I appreciate God for bringing you into my life. Happy anniversary, sweetheart! I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Not everyone has been able to find true love that thrives and grows over time. Finding you, my love, has been a true blessing. May our relationship be blessed with many more years of growth and blessings.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Remember the first time you smiled at me and the way you looked at me gave me the chills? These feelings have stayed with me for years. I’m hoping you’ll stay the same.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May this day bring you a lot of happiness. May the years ahead of us be spent loving and caring for one another. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every time I think of the incredible love we share, my heart melts. I hope it will continue to thrive and expand for many years to come. Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: As we celebrate another year of love and happiness, remember that we are also a beacon of light and hope to others. I hope you’ll never let go of the beautiful love that binds us within each other. Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If I were given the chance to return to this planet, I would seize it with both hands and seek you out sooner than I did in this lifetime so that I could love you for a longer time. My soulmate, I wish you a happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Love becomes stronger over time. If we had a day full of heated but healthy marriage fights, remember that I would cook your favorite dinner that very evening to make things right. Let us continue to do this and wish each other good anniversaries like today till we are old.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Anniversaries are days to celebrate. The love that makes our relationship great. I wish all of your dreams may come true.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary! May the happiness of this day linger forever and till the last breath.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I simply wanted to express my delight at the prospect of another year of love and happiness ahead of us. With each passing day, may our love blossom and flourish even more. Happy Anniversary, my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: When you’re around, it’s difficult for me to keep my blush at away. I hope that even when it’s just a regular day or our anniversary, you’ll stick to me.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Today is a nice day to reflect and travel down memory lane, remembering all of the wonderful times we’ve shared together. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Being with you has been the happiest time of my life. You’ve shown me so much love and attention over the years. I want to wish you a happy anniversary, sweetheart!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Accepting to spend the rest of my life with you was one of the best decisions I’ve ever made.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On our anniversary, I swear we’ll spend the rest of our lives watching Netflix and chilling, having lots of chats, going on dinner dates, and going on small but wonderful trips.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May we never lose sight of what brought us together and what brings us great joy.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’m delighted to have you in my life. Thank you once again for everything! Wishing you a happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May we always share this relationship with a kiss of love and a hug of care.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I was a young child playing in a nursery, and you joined me on my journey of being “together forever.” My love, I wish you a happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: To my better half, I wish you a happy anniversary. The good things in life are more enjoyable when shared with you, and I would rather die with you than with anybody else. Here’s to many more celebrations.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May our love for each other last a lifetime, as we make a lovely couple. Happy anniversary, my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We have an extraordinary amount of love and respect for one another and I am grateful for that. I wish you a happy anniversary, my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I can’t imagine waking up to anybody except you, and on our anniversary, I’ll guarantee it’ll always be you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Aphrodite herself could never have created such a powerful tie as the one we have. May we always be surrounded by such incredible love and caring.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Throughout history, many individuals have looked for love, but none has ever found it like the love we have. May we always be surrounded by great love and pleasure. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’ve wanted to be selfish and make you mine since the day I met you, and I still want to do it now, even though it’s our anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: One of the most beautiful vows we can make is to hold and love one another forever. I love you and happy anniversary, dear!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary to my life partner, and here’s to many more years of happiness ahead.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Sharing a life is like sharing moments in time. The song is different for every one of us, but the dance is stunning.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You didn’t whisper into my ear; instead, you whispered into my heart. You kissed my soul rather than my lips.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: An anniversary isn’t measured in hours of the day, but in each minute when two people remain one.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: When you can’t sleep because reality is finally better than your dreams, you know you’re in love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’m reminded why we’re meant for each other on this day, and every day.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I just wanted to let you know that whenever I see myself happy, it’s with you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Because I saw how perfect you were, I fell in love with you. I realized you weren’t flawless, which made me love you even more.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Love isn’t blind; it sees more, not less, but it’s prepared to see less because it sees more.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: As the years pass, love becomes more abundant, fast, and poignant.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My love for you becomes stronger every day, as I love you more now than yesterday and less tomorrow.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I could walk around my garden all day if I had a flower for every time I thought about you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My eyes will always look for you in a sea of people.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You hold a special place in my heart that no one else could.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It was true love at first sight. I believe I have finally discovered my soulmate after all these years.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Even if we spent another year together, I’d still prefer you over a room full of puppies.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I will spend all of eternity loving, caring for, and respecting you, expressing every day that I hold you as high as the stars.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a decision, but I had no control over falling in love with you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The greatest joy in life is knowing that we are loved; loved for who we are, or rather, loved in spite of who we are.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I went searching for you the moment I heard my first love story, not realizing how blind I was. Lovers don’t meet in the middle of nowhere. They’ve always been in each other.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: This particular day has been set aside exclusively for you. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You were made to be loved – and I’ve loved you, in the idea of you, my entire life.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My heart is overflowing with things that only words can express. This is especially for you today, with all my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I laugh a little harder, cry a little less, and smile a lot more because of you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s a blessing to have you in my life. But, supposedly, all good things must come to an end, piffle, says I, for you, without a doubt, will always be my lover and dearest friend.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My love for you will never fade. I’ve loved you for years and will continue to love you till the day I die. Happy Anniversary, love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Being with you is similar to that delicious cup of coffee I have every morning. Even though I drink it every day, I still appreciate it.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every love story is distinct, one-of-a-kind, and lovely, but ours is my personal favorite. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Another year has passed since I first met the person of my dreams. I am grateful for each year spent with you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We learn that true love never dies; it simply grows stronger and truer with each passing year. Time has proven that your love is the purest form of love that has ever existed. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary! I would find you sooner and love you longer if I could turn back the clock.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thank you for being my lifelong companion. Thank you so much for bringing such joy to my heart. Happy anniversary and I love you so much!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: When it comes to pure love, there is no such thing as an end. I hope we will be able to continue to celebrate for many years to come. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary! Your love is always a breath of fresh air amidst all the hardships, disappointments, and lost hopes and dreams.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We’ve been able to get through the most difficult times of our lives hand in hand and heart to heart, which makes this an even sweeter anniversary. I wouldn’t do it with anyone else on the planet. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Such a divine union can only be formed by two good and pure hearts. May the love we share grow stronger in our hearts as our relationship becomes stronger in days and years!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’m so grateful to be able to share this roller coaster of life with you, through all of life’s highs and lows. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary to the one and only person I want by my side every day and night for the rest of my life. I love you, sweetheart!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Anniversaries are designed to remind us of all the good times we’ve had in our relationship, as well as all the challenges we’ve overcome to get to those happy times. What an emotional rollercoaster we’ve been on.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary, dear. Thank you for always forgiving me, believing in me, and sticking with me no matter what.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May our love for each other grow stronger with each passing year, like a rose. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May one magnificent year of happiness and joy be followed by many more. Let us rejoice and make today an occasion to remember.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I am the happiest, most grateful, and luckiest person on the planet because you are at my side. Happy Anniversary to you, my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I am enjoying a life that is precisely how I imagined it to be thanks to you, my dear. Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our relationship is more than just a love story; it’s a romantic epic. It is not a thousand-mile journey, but rather an experience filled with the nicest things in life and an infinite loop of beautiful memories. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary, dear! Your love is one-of-a-kind and will last a lifetime. It’s the kind that gets stronger over time and inspires others.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Even though it’s our anniversary, nothing has changed. I still miss you a lot even if you’re only gone for a minute!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: With you, forever isn’t long enough. Happy Anniversary, my dear.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On our anniversary, you’ve made me laugh, appreciate you, learn, develop, and be oh so grateful we’re together for another 365 days.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You remind me to rest while I am busy at work. You reminded me to eat my lunch whenever I forgot. Today is our anniversary, and it’s my turn to tell you how much I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary dear boyfriend. The years are just a number which makes us even stronger than ever. I love you so much, many happy returns of the day!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are the true meaning of happiness, joy, and restfulness for my soul. Thank you for treating me like a queen. Happy anniversary, my king. Love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Among the few good things that I have ever done in my life, falling in love with you was the best them. Happy anniversary, my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary my love. I loved you, I love you and I will love you forever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: This is the day we joined our hearts in love. We promised to never leave each other and here we are! Happy anniversary, my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary to the hottest, cutest, and sweetest boyfriend ever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thank you for making the last twelve months so magical and fulfilling every dream of mine. Happy 1st Anniversary. I love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary to my soul mate! I am so happy to have you in my life. Thanks for making my day so beautiful.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Your presence in my life tells me how blessed I am. You completed my life with your love. Thank you for coming in my life, love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: 365 days have passed with a blink of an eye. Every day was filled with love. I cannot imagine a single day without you anymore. Happy 1st anniversary, sweetheart.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Till now whenever I look at your eyes, my heart skips a beat. Till now your presence gives me goosebumps. I love you, man. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Your every kiss and every hug tells me that you have kept the promise you made on this day! Happy anniversary! We’ll never let go of each other!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are my true love of life which I found on this day, I can’t wait to give you some special on this happy anniversary of our blessed relationship, loves you lot honey!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy 2nd anniversary, my love. Thanks for always making me feel so special. I love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Congratulations, you have successfully tolerated me for one more year. Happy anniversary!! Keep tolerating me for the rest of your life no matter what.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It doesn’t matter how far we are from each other; our hearts are always together. I love you so much and I want you to know that I am always with you. Happy anniversary

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I am a blessed girlfriend indeed! May our love grow sturdy each day. Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I will always remember the moment we became lovers. I can’t imagine my life without you since then. Thank you for the love and caring. I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I had been eagerly waiting for our togetherness to complete a year. And today it finally has arrived! Happy Anniversary, Babe!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: For the man that steals my heart, The man that made my heart flutters, The man that sweeps me off my feet and put butterfly in my stomach when he’s around, Happy Anniversary sweetheart!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I always enjoy your company and the peace you offer. Thank you for not being a typical but a rare find. Happy anniversary, darling. Love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It doesn’t matter whether it is raining or shining, you will always be the one for me. Happy anniversary my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My love, Happy Anniversary! The day I met you, I knew you are the one for me. You make my heart smile.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Realizing that I am the reason behind your smile and the sparkle in your eyes makes me fall in love with you even harder. Happy Anniversary, Love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I don’t want anything from you this anniversary, other than a promise to always put every effort required so that we always stay together.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I pray that my love makes your smile the brightest one. Happy Anniversary, my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Never let go of my hand, always keep holding it tightly forever. Happy Anniversary, sweetheart.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: As we complete another year of togetherness, I pray to the Almighty that he always keeps us bonded like this and make our love stronger.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On our anniversary today, I want you to always keep me protected with the shield of your love by embracing me in your arms.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The warmth of your hugs and the power of your love have always given me strength to face all the negativity of this world. Happy Anniversary, Handsome!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I will never let ups and downs bring differences between us. I will do everything that is needed to stay together, forever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every time when I witness a year of our togetherness has passed by, all the sacrifices seems worth it.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Today is the day, when Cupid hit us both to pair us up and to bind us in an invincible bond. We will cherish our anniversary in the best way, today.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our love has finally reached it’s goal by successfully accomplishing a year of togetherness. We will celebrate our anniversary with joy while cherishing our special moments.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Let’s celebrate the day you gave up on finding anyone better than me. Happy 1st anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I love you with all my heart and so on this, the day of our 1st anniversary, I want to say you make me the happiest woman in the world to have your love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: This may be our first year together, But the start of a lifetime of wonderful memories and tons of love. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Today we meet our first year anniversary and every day we have spent together, we have seen our love grow more and more and it has filled our hearts with happiness, happy anniversary my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I will always remember the moment we became lovers. I can’t imagine my life without you since then. Thank you for the love and caring. I love you! Happy 1st Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: What to do on our anniversary is a thought that excites me, but not as much as fondly remembering how it all started in the first place. Happy 1st anniversary my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A year has flown by, and I didn’t even realize it. Is the rest of our lives together going to run just as smoothly? I hope so. Wishing you a very happy 1st anniversary darling.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In the first year of our love, you’ve shown me all the good things that I’ve been missing all my life. Wishing us both a happy first anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Time flies, but the moments we’ve spent together are ours and ours alone. Thanks for being in my life. Happy 1st anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My life will always be full of sunshine as long as I have you in my life. Nothing matters to me as long as you are my boyfriend. Happy 1st anniversary, darling.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I understood the truest meaning of eternal bliss when I got you as my boyfriend. Congratulations on the 1st anniversary, bae. I love you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My dear love, Happy 1st anniversary. Every single day of the 1st year was so new and exciting to me. Let’s be together forever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary sweetheart. It has been a year since we are together but I feel like there are so many things, I have yet to know about you. So let’s take our time to know each other. I love you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We have completed our 2nd year of togetherness. We did face a lot of ups and downs but I am happy that we conquered them all together. Happy Anniversary, Baby.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: With every year that passes by, I pray for our love to get even more deeper. Today, we have crossed another year, that was full of love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It may seem like a blink of an eye, but we actually have spent another year of togetherness so full of love, care and support. Thank you love for being there always!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every time I look into your eyes, I become amazed how your love for me has never changed and remained the same. Happy 2nd Anniversary, love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our bond will only get stronger & deeper. And every year it will bring more reasons to fall in love harder with each other. Happy 2nd Anniversary to my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Love, the past years have been wonderful but I bet the upcoming years will be tremendously beautiful. Happy 2nd Anniversary, I love you to the moon and back.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Ever since we started going out, you have made me believe that fairytales are real. Oh my knight in shining armor, happy 2nd anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Dear love, the days I have spent with you are the happiest days of my life. Thanks for being the warmth in my cold life.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Being loved by you is the most precious gift that I have received from life. Thank you for choosing me as your companion. Happy Anniversary, Love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The bond that kept us connected with love, is getting stronger as we pass each year. I wish this anniversary will make our bond stronger than ever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Just Hold me tight into your arms so that no negativity can touch me ever.This is all I want from you in this anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We have accomplished dreams that we have seen together in the past. I will always be there so that you can achieve all your goals. Happy Anniversary, Love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If we can accomplish most of our dreams in just three years, imagine what we can accomplish in a lifetime! Happy Anniversary, Love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Getting the opportunity to share moments of my life with you, makes me feel the luckiest among all. I promise to cherish your importance life long.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Just like the beautiful pictures and countless memories, you complete me as a person. Happy 3rd anniversary my beloved. I love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thank you for making our relationship a never-ending celebration. Sending you all my love because you are the one! Happy 3rd anniversary, babe. Love you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy 3rd Anniversary to the Most Amazing boyfriend ever. Thanks for always being there whenever I needed you. Cheers to our hot love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In these three years, you have never changed for a second. Till today you behave like it’s our first day and this makes me fall in love with you again and again. Love you sweetheart.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On our anniversary I promise to continue annoying you, because you look so cute when you angry! I love you. Happiest Anniversary dear!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I am amazed by your strength, by your love; for putting up with my craziness all these years! Wishing you a wonderful Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: They say you will find love in every corner – it seems I’m walking in circles because there’s love everywhere since I’ve met you. Happy anniversary dear love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary to the man I will always want and need, even when I am too old to remember what exactly that is.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You’re a thief – you stole my heart. You are a hijacker – you hijacked my feelings. The police will soon be there – I’ll see you soon!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I know I always annoyed you, but do you know the emotions I got from you, are more expensive than life. I should thank God who sent a person for me, I can annoy him for the lifetime. You are the perfect partner for me. I love you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Everything seems fun and time flies faster when you are in a relationship with such a cool person. Happy Anniversary, Boyfriend. I love you more than ever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: God must have been crazy to put you and me together but look how fine we work. Finer than the old wine, I would say. Happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary, My love. Stop forgetting our anniversary. Let’s go and see a doctor for your head today.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary, King! I wish I were there with you on our special day but don’t worry we will celebrate it once we are together. Love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Hey Babe, it doesn’t matter how many miles are between us, we are always together in our heart. Happy anniversary, I love you so much darling.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Even thinking about you gets me butterflies! Happy anniversary. I wish we could celebrate this day together but no worries, I love you anyway.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary, baby! Thank you for giving us the best shot even when things get ugly. Even being in a long-distance relationship with you makes it seem easy. Love yaa.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary, my love. There isn’t a moment I don’t think about you. I love you and I miss you always.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Everyone says long-distance relationships are painful but we have overcome that painful phase together. Every day I can feel myself closer to you. Happy anniversary sweetheart.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Dear love, I hope next year we will be able to celebrate our anniversary together. Let’s be happy forever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I wish there was a word more than ‘love’ itself to convey what I feel for you. – Faraaz Kazi

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life. – Rita Rudner

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are my today and all of my tomorrows. Lee Christopher

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our love is our mystery; It leads us to its discovery; Let us follow it, like a good story; Let us celebrate it, like an anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I will spend an eternity loving you, caring for you, respecting you, showing you every day that I hold you as high as the stars. – Steve Maraboli

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Forever is a long time, but I wouldn’t mind spending it by your side. – Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Forever is a measure of time used by people who share an ordinary love. Our extraordinary love is immeasurable … for us, forever just won’t do. – Steve Maraboli

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: As we grow older together, As we continue to change with age, There is one thing that will never change. I will always keep falling in love with you. – Karen Clodfelder

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I just want you to know, that when I picture myself happy, it’s with you. – Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Real love stories never have endings. – Richard Bach

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Loved you yesterday, love you still, always have, always will. – Unknown

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My dearest boyfriend, happy anniversary! 365 days have passed since we first got together, and I have only managed to love you more and more every single day. Thank you for all your love and support!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Hey darling, I might not show it very well, but I do appreciate your efforts in everything that you have done for us and our future. I love you. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I wish that I can just announce to the entire world that I have already found the best boyfriend in the world. No one else can ever surprise me like you do for our anniversary. Happy anniversary my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Have I ever told you that you are the best boyfriend ever in the whole wide world? I am so lucky to have had the chance to meet you and be your girlfriend! I love you so much my dear. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary to us, the most amazing, lovey-dovey and cute couple in the world. You played your part perfectly! Happy anniversary my dear.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary baby! I hope that I have been an amazing girlfriend to you just as how you have been to me for the past years we have been together. Thank you for everything.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May the rest of our lives always be like our first anniversary – exciting, youthful and hopelessly romantic. Happy first anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May we have many more years of glasses to clink, surprises to throw, cakes to cut, gifts to give and smiles to put on each other’s faces. Happy first anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On our anniversary, let’s recall the memories we’ve made and let’s look ahead at all those memories that are yet to be made. Happy 1st anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The celebration of our anniversary will last for twenty-four hours, but the celebration of our lives together will last a lifetime and beyond. Happy first anniversary my darling.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If my life was a boat, floating over the choppy waters of destiny, you are the set of sails which will see me through. Happy first marriage anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If time could be played over and over again in a loop, I would put the first year of our marriage in repeat mode because it has been fabulous. Happy first anniversary dear.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thanks for making sure that the first year of our married lives was perfect. I promise I’ll do everything I can to make sure that every single year of the rest of our lives is perfect – exactly how you deserve it to be.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On our 1st wedding anniversary, I have this to say – I love my life even more now because you are in it. Thank you for being in my life. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Just as a bird can’t fly without wings, I can’t even imagine my life without you. Happy 1st anniversary my sunshine!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: One year has passed, but I will never forget that moment in my life when you said YES. I’m so happy my darling because you make my life complete!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: When I proposed to you, I gave you a ring. When you said ‘Yes,’ you gave my life wings. Happy first anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Nothing comes close to how I feel when I hold you close. It is a silence that tickles me in the deepest corner of my soul. Happy first anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It doesn’t matter whether we always agree or not. What matters is that I love you and you love me. Happy anniversary, my beautiful wife!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The only things trending in our lives are #happiness, #love, and #romance. Happy anniversary dear wifey!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Like a lock without its key, my life would be useless without you in it. Happy anniversary, my beautiful wife!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A beautiful rose for a beautiful woman who has given me a beautiful life. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I don’t know where I would be if you hadn’t supported me. My life would’ve come to a dead end if it weren’t for you. Today, as we celebrate our anniversary, I just want to say thanks for everything baby.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our house would not have become a home without you. Our kids would not have understood the meaning of family without you. I would not have experienced love without you. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Time stopped the day we got married. I’m stuck in a warp of sunny hues, smiles and everlasting love. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Rewinding to the happy memories of our married life inspires me to fast forward and dream about the amazing future that lies ahead. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Anniversaries will come and go, but our lives will forever continue to be a celebration of togetherness and romance. I love you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A happy marriage is a relationship between two people who know the meaning of commitment, trust, sacrifice, forgiveness, and honesty. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I am one of the few lucky men in this world who can say that my best friend, girlfriend, and wife are the same woman. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You know you’re in a real relationship when making sacrifices for someone else makes you happy from within. I love you, happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I wish that our love will grow higher than the mountain, wider than the sky, brighter than the moon and warmer than the sun. Happy anniversary my dear.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: True happiness is to get married and to feel glad about it for the rest of your life. I am so happy with you, my sweetheart. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Anniversaries are meant to be celebrated. For us our anniversary erves as a happy reminder that we will spend the rest of our life together. Now, then and forever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My anniversary gift is insignificant when compared to the happy marriage and beautiful family you have given me. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Best wishes and happy anniversary to the one behind my success, happiness, and my smiles. You are the reason our marriage has lasted many a mile. Happy anniversary to my wife.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary to my dear wife! I am grateful for the wonderful time that we have spent together. Believe me; those moments are really special to me. I hope we spend our lives together, like this.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You have given my life a new purpose, even when I was trying to let go of everything. You had my back when the times were tough. On this anniversary, I can only wish you happpiness and thank you for all that you have done for me.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary my dear wife. It doesn’t matter how much we argue, what really matters is that we love each other more than our differences. Thanks for all your support. May we have a blessed life ahead.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In times of trouble or happiness, I know you are always with me and will stand by my side. You are everything that I could ever ask for. Here’s to another year of our lives together. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I love being married to you. It’s so great that I have found the person who bears my eccentricities, understands my moods and reads my mind. Happy anniversary sweets!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The day that changed my life, the day that brought happiness in my life, the day when I proposed to you – the celebration of that day is here. And now I am with you. Days have passed on, years have gone by, but my love has not changed for you. I will always love you. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Your love is the strength that drives me to do hard things for this family. You are the armor that shields me . Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The day we took our wedding vows was the beginning of our journey to a wonderland. Hold my hand always my dear, promise me not to let go. Happy wedding anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You and your love are the reason I feel so alive every day. Thank you for your patience and devotion, which always inspire me. You’ve made my life complete, honey, I love you so much. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You know, after all these years of living together, I realize that if I had a chance to change everything, I would never take it. I will always choose you, my dear wife. Congratulations on our wedding anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: When you hug me and hold my hand, my worries go away because I know I have you. I love you baby and I won’t stop. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We have been happily married for 10 years, I have forgotten our anniversary in the past., Today is very special, it’s been 10 years… just let that sink in. We fight, laugh, and cuddlet It has all been worth it.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Many people give their wives gifts on their anniversary. But I have kept it really simple and given my whole life to you my dear. I love you, Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’ve searched every dictionaryto find the meaning of life but I found nothing. When we got married and I looked into your eyes, I found everything. Happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We may have struggles and bumps along the way but what is important now is I have you by my side to face anything that may come our way. Together we are stronger, together we will accomplish anything. Together we are one. Happy anniversary my dear wife!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our anniversary is just a momentary celebration, but our marriage is a timeless one. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: When two people are connected at heart, it doesn’t matter what they do or who they are or where they live; there are no boundaries or barriers. Happy anniversary to us!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It doesn’t matter where you go in life, it’s who you have beside you that matters. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You have made me a better person by loving me for who I am. Thank you for always being there for me. Happy anniversary dear!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: As we learn, let us share. As we take, let us give. As we weep, let us care. As we love, let us live. Best wishes on our wedding anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Anywhere with you is better than anywhere without you. Happy anniversary my lovely wife!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Nothing in this world could ever be as wonderful as the love you’ve given me. Your love makes my days so very bright and sunny. Happy anniversary my lovely wife!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Wow, I can’t believe one more year has just passed us by. How time flies when we are happy, it’s a great honor and pleasure to be your husband. I love you dear. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You’re my beautiful queen and I forever will be your brave and courageous knight, who will protect you from sorrow and tears. Congratulations on our wedding anniversary! Love you madly.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I love you, and I always did, even when we fight, and I yell, Leave me alone I don’t mean it, because you are my everything and if you leave, I won’t have anything left. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Marriage is like vitamins; we supplement each other’s minimum daily requirements.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: They say the first year of marriage is the hardest…and then you get used to it. Happy anniversary anyway, my dear wife.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My dear wife, you are the seat belt in the roller coaster of my life. You protect me at every turn and through all the ups and downs of my life. You are very special to me. Happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Baby, even though you wake me up in the middle of the night with the most annoying snores, I still love you and everything you are. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Oh dear! You know how much I enjoyed annoying you all these days!, I am rejoicing now, thinking that I still have that opportunity, so let us celebrate the anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Peanut butter with pizza is a bad combination, but I don’t care, I like it that way. Cheers to our anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Congratulations on sharing yet another year of happiness, suffering, misery, and tolerance. But don’t you dare leave me alone. I want to share my emotions only with you. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: We are like salt and a paper cut, two things that aren’t supposed to be together but end up that way anyways!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It started with a dream of a life together – and the dream just keeps getting better (despite an occasional nightmare). Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Nothing makes me happier than knowing that you love me for who I am and letting me be myself. Even if I am obnoxious and crazy.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Three kids, two lovebirds, and one mortgage — We’re in this together. Love Ya!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I was once a man who couldn’t handle a woman, but with you, everything was just so easy and fun. As every year passes by I can’t help but love you more, my beautiful wife. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Instead of a card, you should get a trophy for putting up with me another year. You’re the only one for me.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are the light that wakes me in the morning, guides me through the day, and watches over me at night.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It doesn’t matter whether it’s our first or twentieth anniversary, what matters is that we love each other always.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I think that I am constantly doing stupid things because I know that I can always count on you. Happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary to someone I can talk to, laugh with, cry with, and cause some trouble with. Let’s celebrate our anniversary and raise a toast to our togetherness.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If staying married to you for the rest of my life is crazy, then I don’t want to be sane. I can’t imagine my life without you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Another year to create precious memories together. Another year to discover new things about each other. Another year to strengthen a marriage that defines forever. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I always thought nothing could be as flawless and perfect as my life. Turns out, our marriage is. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The happiest day in my life was the day you finally became my wife. I feel so lucky every day to have you as my lover, wife, and best friend. Thank you for your love and care. Happy anniversary my wife!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: True happiness is to get married and be glad about it every day of your life. I am so happy I found you, my sweetheart, happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are so generous with your love time, energy, and forgiveness! Thank you for another amazing year of marriage.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I thought I got the better end of the deal and every year it just keeps getting better.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I hope that a relationship that started with cookies, a fishing trip, and a turtle can always stay pure and simple. It’s still fun to flirt with you. I can always depend on you to laugh. I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’m the luckiest husband to have you beside me. Happy anniversary wife, I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
