Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Five years, 60 months, 260 weeks, or 1,825 days—however you count it, it all adds up to love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: If a five-year wedding gift is silverware, then happy day to you two spoons.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Congratulations to five years filled with new memories and many more to come.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On one hand you have all the years of your marriage. May you run out of fingers and toes to count all those to come.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thanks to this wedding milestone, five is my new favorite number.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: One decade down; forever to go.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Ten years is only the beginning. So long as you're together, the best is yet to come.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May this major marriage milestone be one of many on your path to forever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Cheers to a decade filled with love! Break out the bubbly and toast to your past, present and future.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May your vows mean as much today as they did a decade ago.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: For your 25th year in marriage, may you receive more silver gifts than you have silver in your hair.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Your wedding may have been special, but it's nothing compared to your 25-year marriage.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A quarter may not sound like a lot in money, but in marriage centuries, you two prove it's worth a fortune.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Congrats on 25 years—but who's counting?

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Real love stories never have endings. – Richard Bach

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Fate had big things in store when the two of you were paired.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: In life, it's not where you go, it's who you travel with. – Charles Schulz

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Your everlasting love is an inspiration to us all.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Cheers to your fairytale love story and for continuing to live happily ever after.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Fifty years later and all that glitters is still gold.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Congratulations on a love story that has stood the test of time—50 years and counting!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: May your good fortune in life match your years in marriage

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I’m one lucky wife in this world who is blessed with such a loving and responsible husband. I thank god every day for having you in my life. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thank you for being the reason of my smile. Happy anniversary dear husband, I love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I want to thank you for being not only my husband but also my soulmate and the biggest supporter of me. Happy anniversary dear! I am proud of you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary dear husband! Life wouldn’t be so wonderful If you weren’t there to hold me up every time I fall. I feel very happy to be with you every moment.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s a day to celebrate all the memories we created throughout this year. I want to wish a great anniversary dear husband. God bless you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: On this very special day, I want you to know that you are everything that I have always wanted. Thanks for being with me all these times. I love you a lot!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary, love. You are the reason of my happiness! Thank you for being mine.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Today is the most special day of my life. I have spent a wonderful year with the person I love most. Nothing could make me happier than this. Happy first wedding anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Wedding Anniversary! You are the best husband and the best friend ever! You are my forever and always.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You mean a lot to me. I want to be with you till my last breath! Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Spending a year next to an amazing person makes me nothing but happier. Happy anniversary, thanks for being the perfect partner anyone could ever ask for.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Wishing for more candles on the anniversary cake, happy anniversary to the best hubby ever! I love you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I cannot really express just how blessed I am to have found a husband like you. Happy Anniversary to us!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My love, happy wedding anniversary! You are the greatest gift of my life!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The love and care you have given me in these two years is more than I ever thought for a lifetime. Happy 2nd wedding anniversary my love. You are everything to me!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: [PUT YEAR] years with you seemed like [PUT YEAR] years of magical moments! Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Sweetheart, you are the man of my dreams! I love you so much. Happy wedding anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary dear husband! I’m proud to be yours.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary, darling! I love you with my entire being and will always do. I love you, with the kind of love that’s more than love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Babe, Happy Anniversary to you! Thank you for always putting up with me.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My dear, you are truly my other half! I love every little thing about you. Happy Anniversary to you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My love, each day of my life is special with you. Happy Anniversary! I will forever fight for you and with you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I just can’t believe how long it’s been darling. [PUT YEAR] long years. But we made it. Thank you for everything.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Baby, Happy Anniversary! You are the jam to my peanut butter! I’m so attracted to you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Love, I feel like living in a fairy tale because of you. I will always be the best woman I can be for you. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary! I cannot imagine how boring my life would be without you! I don’t even know what I would do without you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s been a pleasure to share all the responsibilities of the household with you! Happy Anniversary, dear husband! I love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My wonderful husband, thank you for putting up with my mood swings; and for always lifting up my mood when I feel down. I love you so much, Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I still remember the moment when you and I became “we”; I want to hold you tight for the rest of my life. Thanks for always being there for me! Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Here’s to growing old together, hand in hand; being each other’s partner in crime. Happy Anniversary, dear husband.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I love you for the special way you make my heart feel. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I remember not being able to answer my friends what my ideal type should be; but then I met you and I got my answer. Thanks for being my ideal type. Happy anniversary, darling!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Once in a while we meet someone in our life who is capable of giving us the hint that they would be our forever favorite no matter what happens, you are my that person. Happy anniversary husband!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our anniversary is nothing but a timeless celebration with tons of adventures and joyful days. Happy anniversary, babe!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thank you for holding me through everything and anything. I love you my dear husband, happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy Anniversary to my husband! Waking up next to you is the happiest moment of my day!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: There hasn’t been a moment when I haven’t been in love with you. Happy Anniversary my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Baby, Happy Anniversary. You comfort my soul and care for my heart. I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s just our first anniversary together and I can already tell you and I will celebrate at least 50 wedding anniversaries together. Happy first wedding anniversary my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Good moments pass away so fast. I can’t believe we have just spent one year together under the same roof. I wish I could stop the flow of time when I’m with you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: One year has gone knowing each other, taking care of each other. And, I swear, I have never known someone more wonderful than you. Congratulations dear! It’s our first wedding anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every day and every moment with you is special. But today we are going to celebrate all those special moments we shared together. Thank you and I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I fell in love with you so deeply in just one year that I don’t think I can ever live without you in my life anymore. Will you stay with me forever? Happy anniversary dear hubby!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You make me fall in love with you everyday a little bit more than yesterday. I love you,dear! Happy 1st Anniversary. The first of many happy years to come.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I want to pause the time when I am with you, happy 1st anniversary! I love you so much.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s been a year, a full phase of the moon of a roller coaster ride which I enjoyed so much! Happy first anniversary you sexy beast! I love you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Being next to you for one year made me realize how much I want to spend the eternity being in deliciously love with you. Always be by my side. Happy 1st Anniversary, dear husband!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Many good wishes for you on our 2nd wedding anniversary! It’s been the wonderful two years of my life. I look forward to celebrating many more years like this!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I never knew life can be so rewarding towards me. I have been blessed with the most amazing husband in this world. 2 years with a person like you is like living in heaven!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I don’t know what good I did to deserve you in my life. I feel like the luckiest wife in this world. I want you to be with me until the last moment of my life. I love you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I wish I could go out on the street, stop everything and shout out loud that my husband is one in a million. Yes dear, you truly are a precious gem to me. happy 2nd anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: All the things I have achieved in my life mean nothing if you are not with me. I want to let you know that I love you more than you know. I want to celebrate another 100 anniversaries with you!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Dear husband, you are a true and loyal man who supports his wife in every aspect of life! I love you. Happy 2nd Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s been 2 years, 24 months, 104 weeks and 730 days being there for one another and I want to confess that I don’t think I can survive without you. Happy Anniversary, dear. I love you to the moon and back.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: A pair of years with a tremendously responsible person such as you are one of the greatest feelings ever. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I find myself lucky as I found my best friend and soul mate in my husband and nothing feels better than this! Happy 2nd anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You still manage to give me butterflies, even after two years! Happy anniversary my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Happy anniversary to you for putting up with all my craziness. Because if you did not put up, you know there wouldn’t be any happy anniversary after all!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thanks for being with me all these years and still not killing me while I am sleeping. I may be a bit annoying but I know you are patient enough to tolerate me! happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I want you to stay with me for the rest of my life. Because I really need someone to yell at every now and then. I love you a lot! Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Thanks for knowing that your wife is always right, you are a keeper! Happy Anniversary, hubby.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Today we raise our glasses for the best decision you ever made in your life! Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s a very special day in our life once again. I want to remind you that you are really lucky to have me in your life. I feel lucky too because you are stupid but obedient!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s an irony! I love you a lot but at the same time, I want to kill you. So, I have been trying to find a way to kill you with love. Happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It makes me emotional to think about all the things about me you have to put up with every day! But then I realize, if I can put up with yours, why can’t you with mine? I love you dear and happy anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: It’s actually pretty awesome to find a special someone to annoy for the rest of my life. Congratulations on winning the spot, happy anniversary dear husband!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You add cheese to my life and that’s pretty delicious, you know! Happy anniversary xoxo

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I genuinely hope you know that ever since I married you, it’s my favorite hobby to annoy the hell out of you and yeah, I don’t have any plan to stop doing this in the near future or ever.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every time you think that I am crazy just remember you willingly signed up for all this!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My love for you is beyond words. I love you to the moon and back. Happy Anniversary, My Love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Love is the most precious thing that you been giving me all my life. I love you not because of who you are but because of how you make me feel! A happy 25th anniversary, my dear husband.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: This AnniversaryAnniversary may be a reason to celebrate the BIG day of our lives. Still, in reality, every day of my life is the biggest celebration, as you make me feel unique and precious every moment. I love you to the moon and back. Very Happy Anniversary my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Wedding anniversaries are not just about parties, music, gifts, and fun. But it is about the time, love, struggle, and hardships that we face together. Happy AnniversaryAnniversary to my dear husband!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Here’s to the love of my life. Every moment of my life, I feel special and precious as I am the wife of such a wonderful man. Happy AnniversaryAnniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Whenever I look back to all the memories that we have created and the time that we have spent together and I wonder there is no photo frame big enough to have our beautiful memories saved together. Happy Anniversary My Partner!!!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I can’t imagine my life without you; it completely revolves around you just like all the planets revolving around the sun. Very happy anniversary my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are my sun, as you give me light in the darkest hour of my life. And you are my moon, as you give me comfort when I need it the most. I love you. May we always remain like this – together and happy! A very happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Undoubtedly, we have gone through many ups and downs in our marriage, but all that made our life stronger and better. I love you, my life, and I am the luckiest to be your wife. Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I never looked for a perfect marriage; what I looked for was always an adventurous beginning that two people took of finding love! Happy AnniversaryAnniversary, my love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Out of the millions of questions about the meaning of life. I chose to answer only one, and that’s YOU, my love. A very happy anniversary to you.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our AnniversaryAnniversary is a very special day for me for this is the day when I got you in my life forever and ever! A very Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: No matter how tough life gets, no matter how nasty it becomes, but having YOU in my life as my life partner makes every hardship worth it! Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: This was the day when you not only stole my heart forever but also you stole me forever! I love you, my sweetheart! Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: You are everything for me. I love you. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: No matter how many times we fight in a day, the love that we share is incomparable! I love you! A very happy wedding anniversary, my love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Even after 25 years of our marriage, I can’t believe you are mine. I am so lucky, and I feel grateful to be your wife. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My life with you can be described in just two words. Beautiful memories and priceless moments. Happy AnniversaryAnniversary to you, My Love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I still wonder how two different colors get blended together so perfectly, as the same way we two got blended! Wishing you a very happy anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: No matter how imperfect I am, you always made me feel so perfect. No matter how many mistakes I do, you always made me feel the best. I am very grateful to you for your endless love and support. I don’t know how I will thank you in this life alone. Happy AnniversaryAnniversary, my dear!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: My dear husband, this AnniversaryAnniversary I just want to wish us many more years of togetherness and happiness! Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: All the hardships, harsh realities, problems, bitterness, and failures are bearable because I have YOU standing by my side. My love. Wishing you a very happy anniversary, my dear husband.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Like the sun is to a blooming flower and a hummingbird is to the hibiscus and moth is to a flame, we are to each other – utterly inseparable. I wish you a very Happy Anniversary!!!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Each day I spent with you is like forever, and each day that I spend without you is like never! I Love You To The Back And Moon! Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our wedding anniversary can be a momentary celebration, but our marriage is a lifetime one. Happy AnniversaryAnniversary, my husband.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Our marriage is so perfect that all it signifies are the magical things in this world. Happy Anniversary, My Love.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: With each coming AnniversaryAnniversary, the bond and connection that we share become stronger and better! Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: I am very lucky to have you as my husband. Thanks for always being there for me, by my side. You are not only my partner but also my best friend. I love you from the bottom of my heart. Wish You A Very Happy Anniversary.

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: The very first moment when I saw you, I knew we were meant for each other. You are my everything, my confidence, my pride, and my strength. You are mine and always will be. Happy Anniversary!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: All the morning teas and evening talks that we share together have become an eternal part of my life. I love you so much! Happy Anniversary, My Love!

Quotes.author: AnniverSay
Quotes.quotes: Every heart sings a song, incomplete until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet. –Plato
